Description: Normalised hourly profile of woody biomass availability. This accounts for the fact that not the entire resource is available at once due to limitations such as harvesting, transport, storage, etc...
Source for |Swiss_data_Zenodo_link|: Constant hourly profile across the whole year.

Description: Normalised hourly profile of wet biomass availability. This accounts for the fact that not the entire resource is available at once due to limitations such as harvesting, transport, storage, etc...
Source for |Swiss_data_Zenodo_link|: Constant hourly profile across the whole year.
